Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<java.lang.String>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.GUI
public class GUI
extends View
graphical-user interface, this class controls all the panels shown to the user, and notifies client-side controller when the user performs some operation

    • notifyLooser

      public void notifyLooser​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method is called only when there are three players and one of them looses while the other two continue playing. The user that lost the game remains connected in spectator mode
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of player that lost

    • noReply

      used during game setup when the user has to wait

      Method called after setup phase the tiles available to the user are highlighted and a message is displayed
      Parameters:
      currentOperation - current operation the user has to do
      tilesToChoose - tiles available to perform the current operation
